OS Interface Reference¶

class fcb.Event(char=None, special=None)[source]¶

Storage class for event that is to be passed to an app

Variables:
  • is_special – Weather this is a character or special event
  • val – The event value, a character if is_special == False, event dependent otherwise
BUTTON_A¶

Special event type for when the A capacitive button is pressed

BUTTON_B¶

Special event type for when the B capacitive button is pressed

DOWN¶

Special event type for when the DOWN capacitive button is pressed

LEFT¶

Special event type for when the LEFT capacitive button is pressed

RIGHT¶

Special event type for when the RIGHT capacitive button is pressed

UP¶

Special event type for when the UP capacitive button is pressed

class fcb.FCB[source]¶

The main OS class

An instance of this is passed to the __init__ of each app. Every app is expected to store this and use it when accessing the badge hardware.

adt¶

An instance of the ADT75 class for accessing the temperature sensor on the badge

capt¶

An instance of the CAPT1296 class for accessing the capacitive touch chip on the badge

clear_disp()[source]¶
epd¶

An instance of the EPD class for accessing the e-paper display on the badge

font¶
gfx¶
i2c¶

An instance of the I2C class from micropython

read_i2c(addr, register, num)[source]¶
start()[source]¶
write_i2c(addr, register, data)[source]¶
